innCheckOutBanner: Ye be currently checked into th' Inn. Yer Dailies won't damage ye 'n ye won't make progress towards Quests.
bannedWordUsed: Avast! Looks like this post contains a curse word, religious oath, or reference to somethin’ like rum or adult topic (<%= swearWordsUsed %>). Habitica has users from all backgrounds, so we keep our chat very clean. Feel free t’ edit yer message so ye can post it!
bannedSlurUsed: Yer post contain'd inappropriate language, an' yer chat priv'leges 'ave been revok'd.
invitedToParty: Ye were invited to join th' Crew <%- party %>
invitedToPrivateGuild: Ye were invited to join th' private Fleet <%- guild %>
invitedToPublicGuild: Ye were invited to join th' Fleet <%- guild %>
invitationAcceptedBody: <%= username %> accepted yer invitation to <%= groupName %>!
newMsgParty: Yer Crew, <%- name %>, has new posts
name: Name
gemCost: Th' Sapphire cost promotes high quality Ships, 'n be transferred into ye Ship's buried treasure fer use as prizes in Ship Challenges!
sureKick: Do ye really want to remove this mate from the Crew/Fleet?
applySortToHeader: Apply Sort Options to Crew Header
pmsMarkedRead: Yer Private Messages 'ave been mark'd as read
PMPlaceholderDescription: Select a conversation on th' port side
PMPlaceholderDescriptionRevoked: Ye be nah able t' send private messages 'cause yer chat privileges 'ave been revoked. If ye 'ave riddles or concerns about this, email admin@habitica.com t' discuss it wit' th' staff.
PMEnabledOptPopoverText: Private Messages be enabl'd. Pirates can contact ye via yer profile.
PMDisabledOptPopoverText: Private Messages be disabl'd. Enable this option t' allow pirates t' contact ye via yer profile.
PMDisabledCaptionText: Ye can still send messages, but no one can send 'em t' ye.
blockWarning: Block - This will 'ave no effect if th' player be a moderator now or becomes a moderator in future.
gemAmountRequired: A number o' sapphires be required
notAuthorizedToSendMessageToThisUser: Ye can nah send a message t' this player 'cause they 'ave chosen t' block messages.
privateMessageGiftGemsMessage: Ahoy <%= receiverName %>, <%= senderName %> has sent ye <%= gemAmount %> sapphires!
cannotSendGemsToYourself: Cannot send sapphires t' yerself. Try a subscr'ption instead.
badAmountOfGemsToSend: Amount must be within 1 an' yer current number o' sapphires.
abuseFlagModalBody: Are ye sure ye wants t' report this post? Ye should only report a post tha' violates th' <%= firstLinkStart %>Community Guidelines<%= linkEnd %> an'/or <%= secondLinkStart %>Terms o' Service<%= linkEnd %>. Inappropriately reportin' a post be a violation o' th' Code o' Conduct an' may give ye an infraction.
abuseReported: Thank ye fer reportin' this violation. Th' moderators have been notified.
whyReportingPost: Why are ye reportin' this post?
whyReportingPostPlaceholder: Help our moderators by lettin' us know why ye be reportin' this post fer a violation, e.g., spam, swearin', religious oaths, bigotry, slurs, adult topics, violence.
leaderOnlyChallenges: Only ship captain can create challenges
inviteMembersHowTo: Invite pirates via a valid email or 36-digit Pirate ID. If an email ain't registered yet, we'll invite them t' join Habitica.
invitedFriendText: This pirate invit'd a mate (or mates) who join'd 'em on their adventure!
inviteLimitReached: Ye 'ave already sent th' maximum number o' email invitations. We 'ave a limit t' prevent spammin', however if ye would like more, contact us at <%= techAssistanceEmail %> 'n we'll be happy t' discuss it!
gemGiftsAreOptional: Note that Habitica will ne'er require ye t' gift sapphires t' other pirates. Beggin' pirates fer sapphires be a violation o' th' Code o' Conduct, an' all such instances best be reported t' <%= hrefTechAssistanceEmail %>.
partyUpText: Joined a Crew wit' another pirate! 'ave fun battlin' monsters 'n supportin' each other.
partyOnText: Joined a Crew wit' at least four pirates! Enjoy yer increased accountability as ye unite wit' yer mates t' vanquish yer foes!
groupNotFound: Group nah found or ye don't 'ave access.
groupTypesRequired: Ye must supply a valid "type" query string.
questLeaderCannotLeaveGroup: Ye cannot leave yer Crew when ye 'ave start'd an adventure. Abort th' adventure first.
cannotLeaveWhileActiveQuest: Ye cannae leave yer Crew durin' an active adventure. Please leave th' adventure first.
onlyLeaderCanRemoveMember: Only yer group leader can remove a member!
cannotRemoveCurrentLeader: Ye cannae scuttle the group leader. Assign a new a leader firs'.
groupMemberNotFound: Pirate not found among ship's members
mustBeGroupMember: Must be member of the group.
canOnlyInviteEmailUuid: Can only invite usin' Pirate IDs, emails, or usernames.
userAlreadyInGroup: PirateID: <%= userId %>, Pirate "<%= username %>" already in that ship.
youAreAlreadyInGroup: You are already a member of this group.
cannotInviteSelfToGroup: You cannot invite yourself to a group.
userAlreadyInvitedToGroup: PirateID: <%= userId %>, Pirate "<%= username %>" already invited t' that ship.
userAlreadyPendingInvitation: PirateID: <%= userId %>, Pirate "<%= username %>" already pending invitation.
userAlreadyInAParty: PirateID: <%= userId %>, Pirate "<%= username %>" already in a crew.
userWithIDNotFound: Pirate wit' id "<%= userId %>" not found.
userWithUsernameNotFound: Pirate with seaname "<%= username %>" not found.
userHasNoLocalRegistration: Pirate does not 'ave a local registration (seaname, email, password).
uuidsMustBeAnArray: Pirate ID invites must be an array.
emailsMustBeAnArray: Email address invites must be an array.
usernamesMustBeAnArray: Username invites must be an array.
canOnlyInviteMaxInvites: You can only invite "<%= maxInvites %>" at a time
partyExceedsMembersLimit: Ye crew be limited t' <%= maxMembersParty %> deckhands
onlyCreatorOrAdminCanDeleteChat: Ye be forbidden to delete this message!
onlyGroupTasksCanBeAssigned: Only group tasks can be assigned
assignedToYouAndMembers: Assign'd t' ye an' yer <%= userCount %> mates
confirmUnClaim: Are ye sure ye be wantin' to jettison this task?
confirmNeedsWork: Are you sure you want to mark this task as needing work?
userCountRequestsApproval: <%= userCount %> mates be searchin' fer approval
chatPrivilegesRevoked: Ye cannae do this 'cause yer chat privileges 'ave been remov'd. Fer details or t' ask if yer privileges kin be returned, email our Captain at admin@habitica.com or ask yer elder or guardian t' email them. include yer @Seaname in th' email. If a moderator has already tol' ye that yer chat ban be temporary, ye do nah needs t' send an email.
cannotCreatePublicGuildWhenMuted: Ye cannot create a public guild because yer chat privileges have been revoked.
cannotInviteWhenMuted: Ye cannot invite anyone to a ship or crew because yer chat privileges have been revoked.
onlyGroupLeaderCanManageSubscription: Only th' Squadron leader can manage th' squadron's subscr'ption
yourTaskHasBeenApproved: Yer task <%- taskText %> 'as been approv'd.
taskNeedsWork: <%- managerName %> marked <%- taskText %> as needing additional work.
userHasRequestedTaskApproval: <%- user %> requests approval fer <%- taskName %>
groupSubscriptionPrice: $9 ev'ry month + $3 a month fer ev'ry additional squadron member
groupBenefitsDescription: We've just launched the beta version of our group plans! Upgrading to a group plan unlocks some unique features to optimize the social side of Habitica.
cannotDeleteActiveGroup: Ye cannot remove a squadron wit' an active subscr'ption
cantDeleteAssignedGroupTasks: Can't delete group tasks that are assigned to you.
groupPlanUpgraded: <%- groupName %> was upgraded to a Group Plan!
onlyGroupLeaderCanInviteToGroupPlan: Only th' squadron leader can invite users t' a squadron wit' a subscr'ption.
aboutToJoinCancelledGroupPlan: Ye be about t' join a group wit' a cancel'd plan. Ye will NOT receive a free subscr'ption.
cannotChangeLeaderWithActiveGroupPlan: Ye can not change th' leader while th' squadron has an active plan.
leaderCannotLeaveGroupWithActiveGroup: A leader can not leave a group while the group has an active plan
youHaveGroupPlan: Ye 'ave a free subscr'ption 'cause ye be a member o' a Squadron Plan. Yer subscr'ption will end when ye are no longer a member o' th' Squadron Plan.
confirmCancelGroupPlan: Are ye sure ye want t' cancel yer Squadron Plan? All Squadron members will lose their subscr'ption an' benefits.
groupPlanCanceled: Squadron Plan will become inactive on
purchasedGroupPlanPlanExtraMonths: Ye 'ave <%= months %> months o' extra squadron plan credit.
canOnlyApproveTaskOnce: This task has already been approved.
joinedGuildText: Ventured into th' social side o' Habitica by joining a Fleet!
groupPolicyCannotGetGems: Th' policy o' one squadron ye're part o' prevents its mates from obtainin' sapphires.
inviteEmailUsernameInfo: Recruit pirates via a valid email or username. If an email isn't registered yet, we'll invite 'em t' join.
onlyLeaderCreatesChallenges: Only the Leader can create Challenges
onlyLeaderCreatesChallengesDetail: With this option selected, ordinary group members cannot create Challenges for the group.
guildSummaryPlaceholder: Write a short description advertisin' yer Fleet t' other Habiticans. Wha' be th' main purpose o' yer Fleet 'n why should scallywags join it? Try t' include useful keywords in th' summary so that Habiticans can easily find it when they search!
guildDescriptionPlaceholder: Use this section t' go into more detail about everythin' that Fleet hands should know about yer Fleet. Useful tips, helpful links, 'n encouragin' statements all go here!
partyDescriptionPlaceholder: This be our Crew's description. It describes what we do in this Crew. If ye want t' learn more 'bout what we do in this Crew, read th' description. Party on.
guildGemCostInfo: A Sapphire cost promotes high quality Ships and be transferr'd into your Ship's coffers.
noGuildsTitle: Ye aren't a member of any Ships.
noGuildsParagraph1: Fleets are social groups created by other players that can offer ye support, accountability, and encouraging chat.
noGuildsParagraph2: Click th' Discover tab to see recommended Fleets based on yer interests, browse Habitica's public Fleets, or create your own Fleet.
noGuildsMatchFilters: We couldn't find any matching Fleets.
privateDescription: A private Fleet will nah be displayed in Habitica's Fleet directory. New hands can be added by invitation only.
inviteFriendsParty:
Invitin' friends t' yer Crew will grant ye an exclusive
Adventure Scroll t' battle th' Basi-List togeth'r!
inviteMembersNow: Would ye like t' invite members now?
playInPartyDescription: Take on amazin' adventures wit' friends or on yer own. Battle monsters, create Challenges, an' help yerself stay accountable through Crews.
wantToJoinPartyDescription: Give yer username t' a friend who already has a Crew, or head t' th' Party Wanted Guild t' meet potential comrades!
inviteInformation: Clickin' "Invite" will send an invitation t' yer Crewmates. When all members 'ave accepted or denied, th' Adventure begins.
areYouSureDeleteMessage: Are ye sure ye want t' delete this message?
participantDesc: Once all members have either accepted or declined, the Quest begins. Only those who clicked 'accept' will be able to participate in the Quest and receive the rewards.
groupGemsDesc: Ship Sapphires can be spent t' make Challenges! In th' future, ye will be able t' add more Ship Sapphires.
groupNoNotifications: This Fleet does nah 'ave notifications due t' hand size. Be sure t' check back often fer replies t' yer messages!
worldBossDesc: A World Boss be a special event that brings th' Habitica community tagether t' take down a pow'rful monster with their tasks! All Habitica users are rewarded upon its defeat, e'en those who've been restin' in th' Inn or 'ave not used Habitica fer the entirety o' th' quest.
worldBossLink: Read more about th' previous World Bosses o' Habitica on th' Wiki.
worldBossBullet1: Complete tasks ta damage th' World Boss
worldBossBullet2: Th' World Boss won’t damage ye fer missed tasks, but its Rage meter'll go up. Iffen th' bar fills up, th' Boss'll attack one o' Habitica’s shopkeepers!
worldBossBullet3: Ye kin continue wiv normal Quest Bosses, an' damage'll apply ta both
worldBossBullet4: Check th' Pub regularly t' see World Boss progress 'n Rage attacks
groupPlanDesc: Managin' a small team or organizin' household chores? Our group plans grant ye exclusive access t' a private task board an' chat area dedicated ta ye an' yer group members!
teamBasedTasksListDesc: Set up an easily-viewed shared task list for the group. Assign tasks to your fellow group members, or let them claim their own tasks to make it clear what everyone is working on!
groupManagementControlsDesc: Use task approvals to verify that a task that was really completed, add Group Managers to share responsibilities, and enjoy a private group chat for all team members.
inGameBenefitsDesc: Squadron members git an exclusive Jackalope Steed, as well as full subscr'ption benefits, includin' special monthly equipment sets an' th' ability t' buy sapphires wit' gold.
inspireYourParty: Inspire yer crew, gamify life togeth'r.
letsMakeAccount: Firs', let’s make ye an account
exampleGroupDesc: For those selected to join the training academy for The Avengers Superhero Initiative
congratsOnGroupPlan: Congratulations on creating your new Group! Here are a few answers to some of the more commonly asked questions.
whatsIncludedGroupDesc: All members of the Squadron receive full subscr'ption benefits, includin' th' monthly subscrib'r items, th' ability t' buy Sapphires wit' Gold, an' th' Royal Purple Jackalope steed, which be exclusive t' pirates wit' a Squadron Plan membership.
howDoesBillingWorkDesc: Squadron Leaders are bill'd based on squadron member count on a monthly basis. This charge includes th' $9 (USD) price fer th' Squadron Leader subscr'ption, plus $3 USD fer each additional squadron member. Fer example: A group o' four users pirates will cost $18 USD/month, as th' squadron consists o' 1 Squadron Leader + 3 Squadron members.
howToAssignTask: How do you assign a Task?
howToAssignTaskDesc: Assign any Task t' one or more Ship hands (includin' th' Ship Leader or Managers themselves) by boardin' thar seanames in th' "Assign T'" field within th' Create Task modal. Ye can also decide t' assign a Task aft creatin' it, by editin' th' Task 'n addin' th' pirate in th' "Assign T'" field!
howToRequireApproval: How do you mark a Task as requiring approval?
howToRequireApprovalDesc: Toggle th' "Requires Approval" settin' t' mark a specific task as requirin' Ship Leader or Manager confirmation. Th' pirate who checked off th' task won't get thar loot fer completin' it 'til it has been approved.
howToRequireApprovalDesc2: Group Leaders and Managers can approve completed Tasks directly from the Task Board or from the Notifications panel.
whatIsGroupManagerDesc: A Ship Manager be a pirate role that do nah 'ave access t' th' ship's billin' details, but can create, assign, 'n approve shared Tasks fer th' Ship's hands. Promote Ship Managers from th' Shipâs hand list.
recurringCompletion: None - Group task does not complete
singleCompletion: Single - Completes when any assigned pirate finishes
allAssignedCompletion: All - Completes when all assigned pirates finish
pmReported: Thank ye fer reportin' this message.
suggestedGroup: Suggest'd because ye be new t' Habitica.
taskClaimed: <%- userName %> 'as claimed th' task <%- taskText %>.
youHaveBeenAssignedTask: <%- managerName %> 'as assign'd ye th' task <%- taskText %>.
blockedToSendToThisUser: Ye canna send t' this player since ye've blocked this player.
sendGiftToWhom: Ta whom d'ye want ta be sendin' a gift?
PMUnblockUserToSendMessages: Unblock this pirate t' continue sendin' an receivin' messages.
PMUserDoesNotReceiveMessages: This pirate be unable t' receive private messages
PMCanNotReply: Ye can not reply t' this conversation
onlyPrivateGuildsCanUpgrade: Only private ships can be upgrad'd to a squadron.
bannedWordsAllowedDetail: Wit' this option selected, th' use of banned words in this guild will be allowed.
userWithUsernameOrUserIdNotFound: Username or User ID nah found.
cannotRemoveQuestOwner: Ye cannot remove th' owner o' th' active adventure. Abort th' adventure firs'.
giftMessageTooLong: Th' maximum length fer gift messages be <%= maxGiftMessageLength %>.
